meanings.definition: A series of wave crests or troughs.
meanings.sent1: The cymatia of the ocean were mesmerizing to watch.
meanings.sent2: The artist painted beautiful cymatia in the seascape.
meanings.sent3: The cymatia on the beach seemed to dance in the sunlight.
meanings.sent4: Her hair flowed in cymatia as she ran through the field.
meanings.sent5: The cymatia of sound waves filled the concert hall.

meanings.sent1: The curtains had a lovely cymatia design.
meanings.sent2: The wallpaper featured a subtle cymatia that added depth to the room.
meanings.sent3: The cymatia on the cake frosting made it look like a work of art.
meanings.sent4: The dancer moved with a cymatia that captivated the audience.
meanings.sent5: The clouds formed a cymatia across the sky.
